name: CheckParking
tag_list: parking, rate, park, garages, parking-lot, car, find-parking, city-parking, parking-nearby, fast-parking, town-parking, car-parking, parking-space, parking-spot
overview:
CheckParking provides an easy and fast way to locate nearby parking lots and compare rates while on the go. Say goodbye to endless driving in search of parking and overpaying when cheaper lots are available. With a few taps, the best parking spot is within reach.

Features:

  • Wide Coverage: Locations and rates for NYC garages as well as locations for garages in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and Boston. In fact, the app enables you to compare hourly, daily, and monthly rates for NYC garages.
  • Automatic Location Updates: Your location updates on the interactive map and the garage list refreshes as you move.
  • Seamless Price Comparisons: Garage rates are conveniently displayed on the interactive map.

Coverage Areas:

  • Manhattan (locations and rates)
  • San Francisco (locations)
  • Los Angeles (locations)
  • Boston (locations)
